page.title: 04BADDESLEY CLINTON:A COTTAGE
page.content:
{ { { Mr Otton}is a resident of Baddesley Clinton who has lived there for{70 {years}and has lived in{Ivy Cottage}for 50 years. His father and grandfather lived there before him.
The cottage is set in{8 acres}of fields and every year the fields are cut with tractors and mowing machines for hay.
The cottage is{unchanged}and has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a small kitchen & lounge. Mr Otton has built new {outbuildings}& has a lovely{garden}in which he grows his own vegetables & flowers.
